meta.analysis: Comparative Competitive Analysis — General English (Adults) in Tbilisi, Georgia

british_council.format: Available via credit system — price unknown

british_council.note: Available — price not public. Online IELTS Coach from $175

bekas_school.note: NOT currently offered. Moving to Cambridge exams instead.

british_council.note: Secondary Plus; discount to 1700 GEL for full payment

ih_tbilisi.moat: Only Cambridge Authorised Centre + only CELTA/DELTA provider in Georgia

british_council.y_axis: Premium brand, but budget-accessible at bulk pricing
british_council.moat: Official IELTS test administrator + UK Govt credibility + credit system flexibility

alc_tbilisi.moat: US-aligned test prep + college counselling bundle. Very narrow.

emcan.moat: 8 exam types + smallest class sizes (max 5) + regional online expansion

bekas_school.x_axis: Local (independent, but Cambridge partnership bridges to international)
bekas_school.y_axis: Mid-Premium (equivalent pricing to IH, premium teacher quality)
bekas_school.moat: 25 native speakers + 80 corporate clients + 25K Instagram + Cambridge partner + founder brand

preply.moat: $1.2B funding + 38K tutors + AI tools + mobile app

ih_tbilisi.notes: 697 Instagram followers is embarrassing for market leader. No blog. No online booking. Website functional but dated.

british_council.notes: 4.1K Instagram. Credit purchase online. Free resources as content marketing. Linktree aggregation. Referral program. Best institutional digital presence.

alc_tbilisi.notes: Two confusing websites. No social media. No marketing. Digital ghost.

emcan.notes: Functional website with dedicated pages per exam. Instagram exists. Mobile app mentioned. No content marketing.

bekas_school.notes: 25K Instagram. TikTok. YouTube. Facebook Pixel active. TV column. Published textbook. Linktree. By far the most digitally sophisticated school.

preply.notes: Unicorn-grade platform. Full online booking. Extensive SEO blog. App on iOS/Android. ASO across 20+ locales. But no Georgia-specific effort.

ranking.name: Preply
ranking.note: Global platform advantage — unfair comparison to local schools

ranking.name: Beka's School
ranking.note: Best digital presence among LOCAL schools by a wide margin

ranking.name: British Council
ranking.note: Solid institutional digital, but outgunned by Beka's locally

ranking.name: IH Tbilisi
ranking.note: Shocking underinvestment for market leader. Major vulnerability.

ranking.name: EMCAN
ranking.note: Functional but invisible. No brand building.

ranking.name: ALC Tbilisi
ranking.note: Effectively does not exist online. Institutional relic.

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: Beka's School (corporate custom curriculum), EMCAN (OET for medical)
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: HIGH — growing tech sector in Tbilisi creates demand for tech English. No one owns this niche.
MEDIUM — a 'Netflix of English' model could disrupt course-based pricing

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.gap: Online-only local school (not a platform like Preply)
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: No one — all local schools are primarily in-person with online as add-on
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: MEDIUM — could serve Batumi, Kutaisi, rural Georgia without physical expansion

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.gap: Evening and weekend intensive programs for working professionals
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: Preply (24/7 scheduling). Local schools don't publish weekend schedules.
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: MEDIUM — professionals who can't attend weekday classes have few local options

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: Beka's School (80+ clients — dominant). Others barely present.
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: HIGH for anyone except Beka's — 80 clients is still a small fraction of Tbilisi's corporate market

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.gap: Cambridge exam preparation (B2 First, C1 Advanced)
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: IH Tbilisi (existing), Beka's School (launching via Cambridge partnership)
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: MEDIUM — Beka's is about to enter this. Could create head-to-head competition with IH.

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: Beka's School (TV column, textbook). Others: essentially nothing.
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: HIGH — first school to create a strong YouTube/TikTok English learning channel for Georgian speakers could own organic discovery

market_gaps_across_all_competitors.who_partially_covers: Preply (app). EMCAN (mentions mobile app). Others: none.
market_gaps_across_all_competitors.opportunity: MEDIUM — younger demographic expects mobile-first. Local schools haven't adapted.

competitive_landscape_summary.market_structure: Developing oligopoly. Three international brands (IH, BC, ALC) hold institutional credibility. One rising local champion (Beka's) is closing the gap fast. One specialist (EMCAN) serves the test-prep niche. One global platform (Preply) captures budget/flexibility seekers.
power_dynamics: IH Tbilisi holds the Cambridge certification moat but is digitally weak
British Council holds the IELTS testing moat and offers the best bulk pricing
Beka's School is the fastest-growing and most digitally sophisticated — the one to watch
EMCAN quietly serves the test-prep assembly line at the lowest verified price
ALC is a niche US-oriented player that barely exists online
Preply captures everyone the traditional schools can't serve (budget, flexible schedule, no local access)
competitive_landscape_summary.market_maturity: Developing — transitioning to Mature. Clear tier differentiation. International players established. Local champion emerging. Price bands forming. Digital marketing becoming a differentiator.
predicted_evolution: Beka's Cambridge partnership will create direct competition with IH for exam prep
The school that invests in content marketing first will capture organic growth
B2B corporate training is underpenetrated — room for a second serious player behind Beka's
Online-only local offering is an open opportunity — no one has claimed it
AI integration (Beka's already moving) will become table stakes within 2 years
